item.title: The Birth of AI Art: A Deep Dive into Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)
item.description: A comprehensive review of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), exploring their architecture, functioning, and various applications in fields like image generation, text synthesis, and data augmentation.

item.title: Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation ChatBot - Part I (Dev notebook)
item.description: Explore the design and implementation of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) ChatBot for assisting students at university. This RAG-powered ChatBot provides information about internal regulations using cutting-edge text mining techniques.

item.title: Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation ChatBot - Part II (Web application)
item.description: Explore the design and implementation of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) ChatBot for assisting students at university. This RAG-powered ChatBot provides information about internal regulations using cutting-edge text mining techniques.

item.title: Creating Images from Text Descriptions with Conditional GANs
item.description: This article walks through the process of implementing a text-to-image generation model using Conditional GANs (cGAN), exploring the key steps in transforming text descriptions into realistic images.

item.title: Encoder-Decoder Architecture: How Neural Networks Understand Sequences
item.description: This article explores the core components of Encoder-Decoder models, their applications in sequence-to-sequence tasks, and how they enable powerful deep learning solutions for text translation, summarization, and more.

item.title: Unlocking the Power of Variational Autoencoders (VAE)
item.description: A comprehensive review of Variational Autoencoders (VAEs), delving into their architecture, mechanisms, and applications in fields such as image synthesis, anomaly detection, and data compression.
